column17:
Product Description

Biotique skin care for youthful complexion dandelion face vitaliser is a rare combination of naturally occurring nutrients. It is rich in vitamin E and minerals like iron phosphorus iodine potash and sulphur. It also contains nutmeg oil that helps to stimulate the skin and ease wrinkles. The regular use of the vitaliser ensures a youthful complexion. It stimulates the skin's microcirculation cell regeneration helps to firm the face and neck. This vitaliser gives your skin a new glow with firmer features.Directions for Use1.Massage a few drops vitaliser on a thoroughly cleansed skin before the moisturiser or nourisher.2.It is designed to work at night when the skin's cell renewal rate reaches its peak.Qty 35ml
